title: opening
description: A title for a position within an org.

org.description: The org which has the opening.

orgname.description: The name of the organization as listed in the opening.

orgfqdn.description: The FQDN of the organization as listed in the opening.

posted.description: The date/time that the job opening was posted.

removed.description: The date/time that the job opening was removed.

postings.description: URLs where the opening is listed.

contact.description: The contact details to inquire about the opening.

loc.description: The geopolitical boundary of the opening.

remote.description: Set to true if the opening will allow a fully remote worker.

yearlypay.description: The yearly income associated with the opening.

paycurrency.description: The currency that the yearly pay was delivered in.
